original_text: And when the Gentiles heard this, they began rejoicing and glorifying the word of the Lord, and as many as were appointed to eternal life believed.
korean_text: 이방인들이 듣고 기뻐하여 하나님의 말씀을 찬송하며 영생을 주시기로 작정된 자는 다 믿더라

sentences.original_text: And when the Gentiles heard this,
they began rejoicing and glorifying the word of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 기뻐하며 주의 말씀을 영화롭게 하고,

sentences.original_text: and as many as were appointed to eternal life believed.
